game.name: SkyCraft
game.genres: Adventure, Indie, Massively Multiplayer, Simulation, Early Access
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, LAN Co-op, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Skycraft is an open-world survival game for 1-10 players, set in infinite procedurally-generated floating islands.
